citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am on
25-Apr-17.
After speaking with an individual at the facility, it was relayed that no one would be available to walk through the
inspection process for the rest of the day.
